title: jIvanukkuL vaLar
sahitya:
jIvanukkuL vaLar cinmaya dIpamE tiruvaruL AnandamE Om jaga


anupallavi

  phUvil un mangalam vIsuga nAvil un jnAnamE nartanam Aduga


caraNam    kaTTillAk-kATraip-pOl karaiyillAk-kaDalaippOl taTTillA vAnaippOl
taruNa mAmazhaiyippOl veTTu min mEgham pOl veLLa minsAram pOl
eTTu dishaiyum enda uyirum ilanga vAzhvu tulangavE shiva
